subject: Steroids
Perjury
lead_paragraph: Roger Clemens is accused of perjury, making false statements and obstructing Congress for testifying at a House hearing in 2008 that he never used performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Roger Clemens is accused of perjury, making false statements and obstructing Congress for testifying at a House hearing in 2008 that he never used performance-enhancing drugs.
